# locale

**Instance Property**

The locale of the format style.

## Declaration

```swift
var locale: Locale
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FormatStyle/locale(_:)] modifier to create a copy of this format style with a different locale.

## Accessing style properties

- **currencyCode**: The currency code this format style uses.
